import React from 'react'; function VoteTeam({ team, index, voteHomeTeam, voteDraw, voteAwayTeam }) { return (
Category: {team.sport}

Country: {team.country}

Group: {team.group}

{team.homeName}

VS

{team.awayName}

HT
{team.state}
AT

); } export default VoteTeam;
